name: Agriculture blue water footprint
description: Agriculture blue water footprint (m3) measures the volume of surface and groundwater consumed as result of the production of a agriculture good o service. Consumption refers to the volume of freshwater used and then evaporated or incorporated into a product. It also includes water abstracted from surface or groundwater in a catchemnt and returned to another catchment or the sea. It is the amount of water abstracted from groundwater or surface water that does not return to the catchment from which it was withdrawn.
